assets.changelog:
## 新年快乐

这是我们本年发布的第一个稳定版（应该），主要为质量更新，修复了许多问题。

~~由于更新日志构建工具暂时爆炸了，先用 GitHub 的默认模板撑着.png~~

## 有什么变动
* feat(launch): 支持添加自定义 Classpath 头部以用于高级调试 by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1668
* fix: 修复目录名校验时枚举不存在的目录导致的异常 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1679
* fix: 修复 MyListItem 选中时的外观错误 by @MinecraftYJQ in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1694
* fixed: 使同一天内的今日人品相同 by @CharlesLiu9441 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1696
* fix: 修复来自 #1709 的功能隐藏 Bug by @MoYuan-CN in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1712
* Revert "fix: 修复来自 #1709 的功能隐藏 Bug" by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1715
* fix: 删除部分调试代码 by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1727
* fix(form): 可能会在加载窗口的时候出现 null 异常 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1740
* feat: 加入铜披风翻译 by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1753
* imp(feedback):去除标签前面没啥用的说明 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1775
* fix(compfavorites):收藏夹中仅按下ctrl即全选 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1782
* feat: 加入 Motd 字体选择 by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1680
* imp(launch): 添加 preferIPvXAddresses 参数 by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1773
* imp: 去除一些莫名其妙的 space by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1729
* fix(MyMsg): 修复点击 MyMsgBox 控件标题导致的崩溃 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1792
* fix(theme): 修复暗色模式红按钮使用亮色背景 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1788
* fix(selectleft):修复删除版本文件夹报错 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1807
* imp(Screenshot):删除截图后刷新列表 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1811
* feat(savesinfo):存档作弊、困难度、锁定困难度设置 & 修复存档版本信息获取 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1812
* imp: 再次优化了 MotD 的显示效果 by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1708
* fix: 同步上游 Meloong-Git/PCL#7195 修复 by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1726
* feat(gpu): 移除对启动器程序本体的 GPU 高性能选项修改 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1821
* feat(Feedback):移除"网络"标签并添加"任务"标签 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1824
* fix(profile): 存在潜在的写入失败导致的文件数据错误 & 出错自动备份重置档案 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1823
* fix(setupsystem):限速显示异常 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1832
* feat(instancesaves):存档搜索排序 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1810
* fix(comp-fav): 修复收藏夹可能会存在重复项的问题 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1822
* feat(link): 支持 Scaffolding 协议 by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1790
* fix(OtherAbout):更正 pysio 网站的地址 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1860
* style: PageSetupUI 中关于背景内容的措辞统一更改 by @CreeperIsASpy in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1864
* feat:完全移除投票页面 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1885
* feat(selectright):实例列表添加打开实例目录按钮 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1858
* feat(OtherAbout):把 EasyTier 加入特别鸣谢 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1887
* fix(SetupUI):每次打开启动器加载背景视频时都会弹出hint by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1891
* fix(ms-login): XSTSToken 获取部分无法提供预设提示 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1893
* imp(LoginProfileSkin):移除意义不明的Separator by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1896
* fix(Profile):无法保存新建的档案 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1910
* feat: 同步上游预设主页 by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1842
* fix(profile): 在用户不存在正版账号的情况下不允许进行离线以及第三方登录 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1917
* imp: 略微增大 MOTD 的显示宽度 by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1843
* feat(net): 新增 DoH 解析服务器地址功能 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1863
* fix(image): 无法展示部分网站的图片 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1892
* imp:移除只有空壳的你知道吗和回声洞 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1924
* fix:有概率在退出的时候弹错误弹窗 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1928
* bump: 2.13.4-beta.2 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1931
* chore(about): 添加 Ae.Dns.Client 包的版权信息 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1933
* fix(font-selector): 进入个性化页面瞬间重置到默认字体 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1936
* chore: migrate to C# 14 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1940
* feat(OtherTest):皮肤头像生成器 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1919
* feat:为日志浏览添加独立的隐藏设置 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1914
* imp(OtherLog):优化日志的排序 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1967
* feat: 注册 Hint 事件 by @wtommy932 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1971
* ref(Feedback):重构反馈页面 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1972
* fix:PCL主页被CE篡改 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1991
* fix: 修复 Hint 的事件以避免注册失败 by @wtommy932 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1978
* feat:你知道吗 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1927
* feat: 添加当导入0个HMCL档案时的提示 by @lenmei233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1990
* feat: 支持导出整合包界面拖放配置文件导入（#1724） by @lenmei233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1997
* feat: 对部分功能进行区域限制修正 by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1992
* fix(LaunchLeft):切换主题后你知道吗的边框颜色会出错 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2020
* feat(msg-box): 注册 MsgBox 的事件 by @wtommy932 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1979
* fix(instance): 删除实例时无效化对应配置文件 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2024
* chore(ci): 为发行文件进行 GPG 签名 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2022
* fix: 将生成的服务端启动脚本换行符替换为 CRLF by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2025
* imp: 统一化 HintTheme 命名风格 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2032
* Add 'Zombie Horse' skin option to MySkin by @MoYuan-CN in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2035
* fix(ModLaunch):启动 26.1-snapshot 时会显示未找到 Java 0 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2039
* fix: 修复安装游戏完成后启动游戏按钮不可用 by @pynickle in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2040
* fix(ModComp):尝试解决 MOD 数据库文件访问冲突 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2044
* imp: 支持使用 --debug 参数等待调试器 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2045
* docs(ModBase): 修复 XML 注释的问题 by @youzi-3222 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2047
* feat(encryption): 换用 ChaCha20 作为加解密算法 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1559
* fix: 修复无法更改窗口标题的问题 by @CiiLu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2049
* feat: 改用大卡片代替弹窗以及优化永久关闭方案 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2041
* fix: 初次创建档案会卡死 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2051
* fix(profile): 导入档案的时候会报错 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2052
* imp(lnstanceSaves):使存档页面的上边距与其他页面统一 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2054
* fix(hints.txt):错误的换行 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2055
* fix(feedback): 更正检查更新失败的行为 by @youzi-3222 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1980
* refactor: 重构 DNS 解析部分&重构 WebServer by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2021
* fix(downloader): 修复下载器下载小文件问题以及长时间不进行下载重试问题 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2064
* chore(temp-path): 移除自定义缓存目录功能 by @Open-KFC in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/2062

## 贡献者
* @CharlesLiu9441 made their first contribution in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1696
* @CreeperIsASpy made their first contribution in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/1864
